help.title: Help & Documentation
help.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using Football Shirt Collection
help.gettingStartedDesc: Welcome to Football Shirt Collection! This guide will help you get started with managing your football shirt collection.
help.welcomeDesc: Football Shirt Collection is your personal manager for tracking and organizing your football shirt collection. Whether you're a casual collector or a serious enthusiast, our app helps you keep track of everything.
help.feature1: Track all your football shirts in one place
help.feature2: Add detailed information including team, season, player, and more
help.feature3: Monitor the value of your collection over time
help.feature4: Create a wishlist for shirts you want to acquire
help.addingShirtsDesc: To add a new shirt, click the 'Add Shirt' button in the navigation bar or collection page. Fill in the details including team name, season, type, brand, and any other relevant information. You can also upload up to 5 images of your shirt.
help.editingShirtsDesc: To edit an existing shirt, click on the shirt card to view its details, then click the 'Edit' button. Make your changes and save. All changes are automatically synced.
help.deletingShirtsDesc: To delete a shirt, go to the shirt's detail page and click the 'Delete' button. You'll be asked to confirm before the shirt is permanently removed from your collection.
help.favoritesDesc: Mark your most prized shirts as favorites by clicking the star icon. Favorite shirts can be easily filtered and viewed separately in your collection.
help.wishlistDesc: The wishlist feature allows you to keep track of shirts you want to add to your collection. Add items with target prices and priority levels to help you plan your future purchases.
help.statisticsDesc: The statistics page provides detailed analytics about your collection. View breakdowns by team, brand, season, and more. Track your total investment and estimated collection value over time.
help.profileSettingsDesc: Manage your account settings, change your password, update your profile photo, and customize the app's appearance. You can switch between light and dark themes and change your display currency.
help.faq1Question: How do I import my existing collection?
help.faq1Answer: Currently, shirts need to be added manually. We're working on a bulk import feature that will be available in a future update.
help.faq2Answer: Yes, all your data is automatically saved to our secure servers. Your collection is safe and accessible from any device when you log in.
help.faq3Question: Can I export my collection data?
help.faq3Answer: Yes! Go to the Statistics page and use the export buttons to download your collection as CSV or JSON format.
help.contactDesc: Have questions or need help? We're here for you. Reach out to our support team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

hero.subtitle: Record every detail. Preserve every moment. Team, season, player, price, condition... Your collection deserves professional management.

features.title: Everything in One Place
features.subtitle: All the tools you need to professionally manage your collection

collection.title: Collection Management
collection.desc: Team, season, type, brand, size, condition, player, number, competition, purchase price, current value, notes... Manage every detail of your shirts in one place.

statistics.title: Detailed Statistics
statistics.desc: Visualize your collection's total value and distribution by brand/team/season. Export your data as CSV and JSON.

wishlist.title: Wishlist
wishlist.desc: Save shirts you want to buy with target prices and priority levels. Plan the future of your collection.

gallery.title: Image Gallery
gallery.desc: Upload up to 5 high-quality photos per shirt. Lightbox viewing and full-screen zoom support.

currency.title: Multi-Currency
currency.desc: Track your collection's value in TRY, USD, EUR, or GBP. Automatic currency conversion.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.desc: Your data is encrypted and stored on secure servers. Nothing is lost with automatic backups.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Start managing your collection in three simple steps

step1.title: Create an Account
step1.desc: Sign up for free and start managing your collection right away.

step2.title: Add Your Shirts
step2.desc: Record the details, photos, and value of each shirt.

step3.title: Track & Analyze
step3.desc: Monitor your collection's growth with statistics and reports.

cta.title: Your Collection Awaits
cta.subtitle: Like thousands of collectors, give your shirts the professional management they deserve.
cta.trust: No credit card required • Free forever

showcase.title: See It in Action
showcase.subtitle: A clean, intuitive interface designed for collectors. Manage your entire collection with ease.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Football Shirt Collection is a free platform that allows you to manage your shirt collection digitally. You can record all details like team, season, player, and price.
faq.a2: Yes, Football Shirt Collection is completely free and will remain so forever. No credit card required.
faq.q3: How many shirts can I add?
faq.a3: Unlimited! No matter how large your collection is, you can add all your shirts.
faq.a4: Yes, all your data is encrypted and stored on secure servers. With automatic backups, nothing is ever lost.
faq.a5: We support TRY, USD, EUR, and GBP currencies. You can track your collection's value in your preferred currency.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for questions or suggestions.
